A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie was visually stunning\, and had many good actors\, and is a decent sci-fi flick. However\, as a star war movie\, the plot was an abomination full of contradictions\, plot convenience\, plot armor\, and lack of common sense. It felt as if the creators had never watch any star wars movies before it\, and almost every single plot decision the writers made\, left me scratching my head.
